companyOverview.title: Leaders in Brass Casting Manufacturing
companyOverview.content: Maa Brass stands as a pioneering force in brass casting manufacturing, rooted in the heart of Jamnagar, Gujarat â€“ India's renowned Brass Capital. With over 90 years of unparalleled expertise, we have consistently delivered high-precision casting solutions across diverse industries. Our state-of-the-art foundry specializes in multiple casting techniques including sand, die, investment, gravity, and centrifugal casting, enabling us to meet the most complex manufacturing challenges. Equipped with 65+ CNC machines and an unwavering commitment to quality, we transform raw materials into intricate brass components that power automotive, plumbing, electrical, and industrial sectors worldwide. Our legacy is built on technical excellence, innovative problem-solving, and a deep understanding of metallurgical engineering.
companyOverview.subtitle: Shaping the future of engineering with precision and innovation.
